org.xchain.namespaces.core

Class XChainCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.namespaces.core.XChainCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Catalog

    @Element(localName="catalog")
public class XChainCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
implements Catalog
    The default implementation of Catalog for the XChains package.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> commandMap
      The map of commands in this catalog.
      protected java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command>> commandMapList
      A list of all command maps attached to this catalog through import.
      protected CompositeMap<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> compositeCommandMap
      A composite map that will look values up from the command map list.

      • commandMap

        protected java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> commandMap
        The map of commands in this catalog.

      • commandMapList

        protected java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command>> commandMapList
        A list of all command maps attached to this catalog through import. The command maps are sorted by precedent.

      • compositeCommandMap

        protected CompositeMap<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> compositeCommandMap
        A composite map that will look values up from the command map list.
